indications:
Indications vestibular disorders, such as vertigo,
tinnitus, nausea, and vomiting in Ménière’s disease; motion sickness
name: CINNARIZINE With dimenhydrinate
breadcrumbs: 4.6 Drugs used in nausea and vertigo
side-effects:
Side-effects section 3.4.1; also rarely weight gain, sweating, lichen planus, and lupus-like
skin reactions
doses: Vestibular disorders, 30 mg 3 times daily; child 5–12 years 15 mg 3 times daily

Motion sickness, 30 mg 2 hours before travel then 15 mg every
8 hours during journey if necessary; child 5–12 years, 15 mg 2 hours before travel then 7.5 mg every 8 hours
during journey if necessary

    Label:
    2Dose adult over 18 years, 1
tablet 3 times daily
